ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There are certainly Signs in that for the discerning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Herein are really signs for those who discern.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: There are great Signs in this for those endowed with intelligence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In this there is evidence (of the Truth) for the prudent ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed in this are signs for people who perceive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Surely, in this are signs for those who see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely in this are signs for those who examine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely in that are signs for such as mark;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! therein verily are portents for those who read the signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: There are certainly signs in that for those who can learn a lesson --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily therein are signs for men of sagacity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There are indeed signs in that for the percipient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold! in this are Signs for those who by tokens do understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Surely! In this are signs, for those who see (or understand or learn the lessons from the Signs of Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, in that there are signs for those who contemplate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Surely in that are lessons for those who read signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:75] Indeed in that, which is mentioned, there are signs, indications of God’s Oneness, for those who take note, [those who] observe and take heed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Lo! Therein) in that which We did to them (verily are portents) signs and lessons (for those who read the signs) it is also said that this means: for those who meditate; and also: for those who can see; and: for hose who take admonition.
